rdf:Description.dc:title: Diversity : a strategy to meet your need for skilled workers 2002 a strategy to meet your need for skilled workers /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Human Resources and Employment.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Human Resources and Employment,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Topics covered include workplace changes, building a business case for diversity, aboriginal people, immigrants, older workers, persons with disabilities, visible minorities, youth.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Labor supply
Manpower policy
Labor mobility.
Career development.
